metadata.description: Portfolio of Anas Attoum, a Front-End Developer specializing in React.js, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. Showcasing projects, skills, and professional experience.

about-me: I have always been fascinated by how website interfaces are created, which sparked my journey into Front-End development. I began by honing my web design skills using Figma, translating creative ideas into compelling visuals. To bring these designs to life, I focused on mastering React.js and Next.js, enabling me to build interactive and dynamic web pages. As an IT engineer, I am committed to continuously learning new technologies and techniques to enhance user experiences and create innovative, high-quality web solutions.
lets-connect:
Let’s Connect!

and make something amazing together
drop-message:
I’m currently looking for new opportunities, whether it’s a part-time of full-time position, my inbox is always open.

Drop me a message!
